name: Kilfenora
description: This plain set, which was danced mostly to quadrille music around Kilfenora in previous times, was passed by Michael Slattery of Kilfenora. A written description of the movements as the set was danced were given to the late John Byrt by his uncle Tom Byrt in 1963. John’s brother George is a noted piano and keyboard player with various Clare Ceili Bands over many years. These notes were found in John’s house when he passed away in 1975 and they were given to Michael Slattery by John Byrt’s son Enda. Description from Apples In Winter by Pat Murphy.

movements.name: Lead around
movements.description: Gent's arm around lady's waist and her left hand on his shoulder.

movements.name: Set and swing
movements.description: Face partners and dance four 3s in place (4 bars) then swing with waltz hold.

movements.name: Square
movements.description: Couples square without taking hands. Pass through with ladies in the center. Left shoulder with partner, pass back with ladies in the center and pass your partner again left to left.

movements.name: Ladies chain
movements.description: Danced with hands low, ladies take right hands in the center, turn around the gent with left hand and pass the lady back to place.

movements.name: Pass through, lead back
movements.description: Couples square halfway and lead back to place counter-clockwise with hands held in front.

movements.name: Lead around
movements.description: Gent's arm around lady's waist and her left hand on his shoulder.

movements.name: Set and swing
movements.description: Face partners and dance four 3s in place (4 bars) then swing with waltz hold.

movements.name: Advance, retire
movements.description: Top couples, advance/retire twice, R hand in R, as tops retire, sides advance.

movements.name: Crossover
movements.description: As sides retire tops cross over turning ladies 1/2 turn clockwise underarm.

movements.name: Crossover
movements.description: Return to home positions.

movements.name: Lead around
movements.description: Gent's arm around lady's waist and her left hand on his shoulder.

movements.name: Set and swing
movements.description: Face partners and dance four 3s in place (4 bars) then swing with waltz hold.

movements.name: Slow turn
movements.description: Top gent, opposite lady advance and take right hands, dance a slow turn clockwise in the center of the set.

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: Top gent and opposite lady swing in center.

movements.name: Line up
movements.description: Top gent, opposite lady advance and take left hands, dance slow turn counter-clockwise in center to own side, give right hands to partners and dance in line counter-clockwise to opposite positions.

movements.name: Advance, retire and pass through
movements.description: Top gent and opposite lady advance and retire once, bowing as they retire, both couples dance back to place, pass partners left shoulder to return to place.
Top couples repeat with 2nd gent leading.
Repeat with 1st side gent (on left) leading.
Repeat with 2nd side gent leading.

movements.name: Lead around
movements.description: Gent's arm around lady's waist and her left hand on his shoulder.

movements.name: Set and swing
movements.description: Face partners and dance four 3s in place (4 bars) then swing with waltz hold.

movements.name: Ladies chain
movements.description: Top gent, opposite lady advance and take right hands, dance a slow turn clockwise in the center of the set.

movements.name: House inside
movements.description: 1st top couple house inside and leave the lady on the left of the 2nd top gent.

movements.name: Wheelbarrow
movements.description: With the 1st top gent holding the ladies inside hands and 2nd gent holding their outside hands, the formation advances, retires, advances (6 bars), ladies turn to stand beside the 1st gent without turning under the gents arms. The formation again advances, retires, advances, the ladies turn to face each other to form a little christmas.

movements.name: Swing four
movements.description: Swing in four with the hands around the waist.
Repeat with 2nd tops leading.
Repeat with 1st sides leading.
Repeat with 2nd sides leading.

movements.name: Lead around
movements.description: Gent's arm around lady's waist and her left hand on his shoulder.

movements.name: Set and swing
movements.description: Face partners and dance four 3s in place (4 bars) then swing with waltz hold.

movements.name: 7's in, back and across
movements.description: In waltz hold top couples dance 7's to the center and back, then 7's to opposite place.

movements.name: 7's in, back and across
movements.description: In waltz hold top couples dance 7's to the center and back, then 7's back home.
Sides couples leading.

movements.name: Circle
movements.description: Adv & retire twice in a circle

movements.name: Swing
movements.description: In waltz hold.

movements.name: Body
movements.description: All in waltz hold, dance 1 bar into the set & 1 bar back out then turn 2 bars on to the next place on the R (4 bars). Repeat into each place until back home.

movements.name: Advance, retire, ladies move on
movements.description: Advance/retire once, ladies join right hands in center dance 3/4 way around to gent to the right of their starting position.
Repeat until ladies are swinging with their partners again.
